title: Hanes Men's Essentials Midweight T Pack, Cotton Muscle Tank Shirts, 3-Pack
description: ESSENTIAL QUALITY, ESSENTIAL STYLE - Outstanding quality and value you have come to expect from Hanes.
VALUE PACK - Each pack contains three men’s muscle t-shirts.
MIDWEIGHT COTTON - 100% cotton midweight fabric makes this a shirt you can wear all year. Black, Light Steel, and Oxford Grey are a cotton/polyester blend.
MOVE WITH EASE - Sleeveless muscle tank offers perfect range of movement, great for workouts to weekend.
DESIGN DETAILS - Accented with a ribbed collar for added sporty style.
STURDY CONSTRUCTION - Double-needle stitching at the hems.

From workouts to lounging around the house, this versatile midweight muscle t-shirt design from the Hanes® Essentials collection is your new go-to for everyday wear. Crafted from U.S.-grown cotton and finished with a thick ribbed collar and sturdy double-needle stitching, this classic men's tank is is a valuable layering piece that also works as a standout standalone top layer. Now available in a convenient pack of three classic men's muscle shirts - so you don't ever have to be without a clean Hanes tee.
